fullText: Lynn Nottage's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about blue-collar workers in Reading, Pa., is a compassionate but unsparing look at how economic decline can tear apart a community.
dtliExcerpt: Lynn Nottage's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about blue-collar workers in Reading, Pa., is a compassionate but unsparing look at how economic decline can tear apart a community.
